deals.title: Skinny Coco Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Strawberries, banana, plant-based protein and coconut water.

The Skinny Coco Smoothie has a fruity taste profile form the strawberries paired with coconut water and uses plant-based protein so is dairy-free and vegan. This smoothie is high in antioxidants, low in sugar and is a refreshing option.

deals.title: Pure Berry Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Blueberries, strawberries, banana, grass-fed whey protein and coconut water.

The Pure Berry Smoothie has a berry base of blueberries and strawberries with a touch of banana which is blended with coconut water and grass-fed whey protein for a creamy and tangy taste. There is a high dose of antioxidants and polyphenols in this smoothie from all the key ingredients.

deals.title: Collagen Berry Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
The Collagen Berry Bowl is a blend of organic acai, strawberries, grass-fed collagen, and almond milk. Topped with fresh blueberries, strawberries, almond butter, chia seeds, and hemp granola, it offers the perfect balance of protein and antioxidants to fuel your day.

Base: Organic acai blended with strawberries, grass-fed collagen & almond milk
Toppings: Fresh blueberries, strawberries, almond butter, chia seeds & hemp granola

deals.title: Blue Royale Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Blueberries, almond butter, grass-fed whey protein, coconut butter and almond milk.

The Blue Royale Smoothie has incredible taste and is antioxidant rich powered by blueberries. The Blue Royale has a touch of coconut butter in it which adds a depth and richness to the flavor profile and also provides the benefits of lauric acid, an important fatty acid for the body.
